attributes.action: I want support in adopting orphaned Palestinian children, before they all perish
attributes.additional_details: Only the higher authorities can allow and support such a humanitarian action. We want to help, but without the higher authorities support this is not possible.
attributes.background: Allow and support the adoption and relocation of orphaned Palestinian children, before they all perish in the war. All children deserve a life, a future,  a family,  care and love. These children are no different.  They do not deserve this war.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create a visa route for Palestinian Orphans and Simplify Adoption Processes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715558
